             </li>
             <li id="link16791697">
              <a id="link_16791697" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/silkspices" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16791697,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16791697});">
               Silk, Spices and World Trade
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link18068429">
              <a id="link_18068429" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/tudorstuart" target="_blank" onclick="hit(18068429,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18068429});">
               Tudor-Stuart England
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link24881019">
              <a id="link_24881019" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/urbanafrica" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24881019,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24881019});">
               Urban Africa
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link20621416">
              <a id="link_20621416" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/womensamerica" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20621416,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20621416});">
               Women's America
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link22413959">
              <a id="link_22413959" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/ww2eurocinema" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22413959,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22413959});">
               World War II in European Cinema
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10149090">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10149090">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10149090">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference Works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10149090">
          <div id="boxatt10149090" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23480670">
              <a id="link_23480670" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com/content/title/berkchina" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23480670,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23480670}); ">
               Berkshire Encyclopedia of China
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides insight into Chinese history and culture today in nearly a thousand articles that include everything from Adoption and Banking to Wound Literature and the Zhou Dynasty. Designed for students, teachers, businesspeople, government officials, and tourists seeking a greater understanding of China today.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12344701">
              <a id="link_12344701" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://histories.cambridge.org/uid=1931/browse" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12344701,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344701}); ">
               Cambridge Histories Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text online access to the complete 250-plus volumes of the Cambridge Histories reference series. Provides political, economic and social history, philosophy and literature of selected countries and subjects. Most histories are multi-volume, with invited editors and contributors of considerable renown.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20849405">
              <a id="link_20849405" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20849405,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469712">
              <a id="link_23469712" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com/content/title/routafricanhistory" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469712,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469712}); ">
               Encyclopedia of African History
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Covers the history of the entire African continent from Morocco, Libya, and Egypt in the north to the Cape of Good Hope in the south, and the surrounding islands from Cape Verde in the west to Madagascar, Mauritius, and Seychelles in the east.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469722">
              <a id="link_23469722" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/5BDB" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469722,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469722}); ">
               Encyclopedia of African-American Culture and History : The Black Experience in the Americas
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A five-volume set and supplement covering all aspects of the African-American experience from 1619 to the present day. Using biographies, historical essays, and thematic pieces, many written by foremost scholars, it addresses a wide array of subjects in over 2,300 articles to define in one source the cultural roots, participation in American life, and current condition of the African-American community.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469474">
              <a id="link_23469474" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com/content/title/sageauh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469474,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469474}); ">
               Encyclopedia of American Urban History
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A two volume A to Z encyclopedia covering the rise of urban America in the 20th century.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469747">
              <a id="link_23469747" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0IMU" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469747,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469747}); ">
               Encyclopedia of European Social History from 1350 to 2000
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Covering the period from the beginning of the Renaissance to the present, this encyclopedia consists of 209 signed articles and nearly 300 biographical entries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12344702">
              <a id="link_12344702" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1UMT" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12344702,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344702}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Latin American History and Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Newly revised and online, well-respected resource complete with recommended readings for further study.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469964">
              <a id="link_23469964" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0SFX" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469964,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469964}); ">
               Encyclopedia of India
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A four-volume survey of the history, cultures, geography and religions of India from ancient times to the present day. Includes more than 600 entries, arranged alphabetically.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23470021">
              <a id="link_23470021" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0OUF" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23470021,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23470021}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Modern Asia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Online version of a six-volume survey of modern Asia, defined as extending from Japan in the east to Turkey in the west, and from Kazakhstan in the north to Indonesia in the south.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23470025">
              <a id="link_23470025" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0PFU" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23470025,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23470025}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Russian History
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides a comprehensive discussion of Russia's people, politics, economics, religion, and social systems; and is designed to complement the study of comparative politics, world history, geography, literature, arts and culture and world cultures. Entries span the period from the earliest beginnings of the Russian nation to the rise and fall of the Soviet Union.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469757">
              <a id="link_23469757" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0PFZ" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469757,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469757}); ">
               Europe, 1450 to 1789 : Encyclopedia of the Early Modern World
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A six-volume survey of European history from 1450, the beginning of the print revolution, to 1789 and the French Revolution. Presents over 1,000 alphabetically arranged entries covering the period's most significant personalities and meaningful developments in the arts, religion, politics, exploration, and warfare.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469753">
              <a id="link_23469753" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0SFZ" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469753,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469753}); ">
               Europe 1789 to 1914 : Encyclopedia of the Age of Industry and Empire
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A five-volume survey of European history from the onset of the French Revolution to the outbreak of World War. Alphabetically arranged entries cover the period's most significant personalities and meaningful developments in the arts, religion, politics, exploration, and warfare.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469751">
              <a id="link_23469751" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0SFY" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469751,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469751}); ">
               Europe since 1914 : Encyclopedia of the Age of War and Reconstruction
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A multi-volume survey of European history from the beginning of World War I in 1914 to the present, presented through alphabetically arranged entries that focus on the period's scientific, social and cultural history as well as the political, military and economic developments. For students and general readers.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469714">
              <a id="link_23469714" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1PCT" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469714,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469714}); ">
               Gale Encyclopedia of U.S. History. Government and Politics
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides a concise history of the U.S. government and political scene throughout American history, with a particular emphasis on how government and politics affect, and are affected by, social change.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469719">
              <a id="link_23469719" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://site.ebrary.com/lib/muhlenberg/Top?id=10397702" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469719,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469719}); ">
               Princeton Encyclopedia of American Political History
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This encyclopedia covers the major forces that have shaped American politics from the founding to today. It traces the history of political institutions, parties, and founding documents. It explains ideas, philosophies, and movements that shaped American politics.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile2897473" class="profile_wrapper">
       <div class="roundbox outerbox">
        <div class="roundbox headerbox">
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
           <td>
            <h2>
             Subject Guide
            </h2>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </div>
        <div class="roundbox innerboxprofile" style="padding:5px;">
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
           <td>
            <div class="profile_image_box" id="profile_image_box_63914">
             <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/profile/cannon" title="View Profile">
              <img alt="Profile Image" border="0" src="//lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/data/profiles/63914/kelly_2_feb_2013.jpg" class="profile_image_align profileimage" style="max-width:140px;" />
             </a>
             <div class="profile_display_name">
              Kelly Cannon
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="profileh4">
             <div class="profilecontent">
              <b>
               Contact Info
              </b>
              <br />
              484-664-3602
              <br />
              <a href="mailto:kcannon@muhlenberg.edu">
               Send Email
              </a>
              <br />
             </div>
             <div id="profile_links" class="profilecontent">
              <b>
               Links:
              </b>
              <br />
              <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/profile/cannon" id="profile_link">
               Profile &amp; Guides
              </a>
             </div>
             <div class="profilecontent">
              <b>
               Subjects:
              </b>
              <br />
              <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/cat.php?search_cat=Humanities+and+Business&amp;mode=profile_search">
               Humanities and Business
              </a>
             </div>

           </td>
          </tr>
